name: Don't Play This Flight Simulator
description:
this game is awful, it is poorly optimised and looks awful...  but it was made in under 3 hours so i think it is okay...  made for the friday night jam

its a simple game where u fly around and shoot stuff...  i tried my best to make it good but the three hour time limit ruined it

controls

Move mouse to move

click to shoot

enter to start

any button to respawn
